## ğŸ’¡ Tips for Good Daily Updates

### DO âœ…
- Be specific about what you accomplished
- Include time spent on each task
- Mention blockers early so team can help
- Share learnings that might help others
- Be honest about progress

### DON'T âŒ
- Write vague updates like "worked on code"
- Skip time logging
- Hide blockers or problems
- Copy-paste same update daily
- Forget to update before EOD

### Example of GOOD Update:
```
âœ… Tasks Completed Today
1. âœ… Implement error handling for API calls (2.5 hours)
   - Added try-catch blocks in LLMManager
   - Implemented exponential backoff retry (3 attempts)
   - Tested with network failures
   - Result: API calls now 99% reliable

ğŸ’­ Notes & Learnings
- Learned about exponential backoff pattern
- Found that Gemini API has 15 req/min limit
- Need to implement rate limiting next
```

### Example of BAD Update:
```
âœ… Tasks Completed Today
1. âœ… Worked on API stuff

ğŸ’­ Notes & Learnings
- Did some coding
```
